text: <@U026E0ZNR> Had time to think about this over the weekend. My understanding is that this  channel is for the back projection setup project while #motion is more of a channel to share links and discuss motion stuff across projects?
If that’s correct, would it make sense to keep those 2 separate to prevent confusion and reduce the noise? I’m fine either way but wanted to ask that question before consolidating the 2.
I think that makes sense. Maybe I'm actually treating this more like the #motion channel. I was just wondering. I think it's fine we have them separate.
I think the projector channel might go away once we have the screens and projectors set up
just need a way to get consensus there while that stuff is being figured out
^ that’s how i’ve thought about it. makes sense to me
Cool. Maybe we make an #[project-name] channel when we start to work on it.
In the spirit of that and given the recent sandbox project announcements, I’ve created <#C09HT2S68> to begin chatting, planning and building whatever that project is.
Feel free to join if you would like to collaborate on that one.
